entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Yoho (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:06 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
